items.title: GoTask — Workspace & Task Management
items.summary: A Trello-inspired task management web app focused on team collaboration and productivity.
items.description: Designed and developed a modular frontend architecture using React and Vite. Implemented workspace-based task organization, drag-and-drop card management with dnd-kit, member invitation flow, and responsive UI. Emphasis on clean state handling, reusable components, and scalable UI patterns.

caseStudy.label: Case Study
caseStudy.title: GoTask — Collaborative Task Management App
caseStudy.subtitle: A Trello-inspired task management application built by a small team, focusing on clean UI, scalable frontend architecture, and practical collaboration workflows.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Small teams often struggle to manage tasks effectively due to scattered tools and unclear workflows, leading to poor visibility and reduced productivity.
points: Tasks spread across chat applications and personal notes
No clear task ownership or progress tracking
Overly complex tools for simple team needs
Poor user experience for new or non-technical users

solution.title: The Solution
solution.description: GoTask was built as a lightweight task management application that emphasizes clear UI structure, smooth interactions, and scalable frontend patterns suitable for small teams.
features: Drag and drop task cards using dnd-kit
Responsive layout for desktop and mobile
architecture: Clear separation between UI and data logic

items.title: Drag & Drop with dnd-kit
items.desc: Chosen for its flexibility and accessibility support. Implemented droppable empty boards to ensure a smooth user experience even when columns contain no tasks.

items.title: Frontend–Backend Collaboration
items.desc: Defined API contracts early with the backend developer, allowing frontend development to progress independently and reducing integration issues.

items.title: UI Consistency with Tailwind CSS
items.desc: Used Tailwind CSS to maintain consistent spacing, typography, and color usage while enabling rapid UI iteration.

outcomes.title: Outcomes & Learnings
points: Built a complete task management UI from scratch
Gained hands-on experience with complex drag and drop behavior
Improved collaboration between frontend and backend roles
Applied UI/UX principles for productivity-focused interfaces
Strengthened understanding of scalable React architecture
